Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Annunciation:

Text.Language: Gabriel came to you: O Virgin Mary: With birth of the eternal Logos, he preached you: And the Son dwelt in you fully.

Alleluia (4). Jesus Christ, the Son of God, was incarnate of the Virgin.
